name: Margo I. Seltzer
content: Margo Seltzer | MARGO I. SELTZER is the Canada 150 Research Chair in Computer Science at the University of British Columbia. Her research interests are in systems, construed quite broadly: systems for capturing and accessing data provenance, file systems, databases, transaction processing systems, storage and analysis of graph-structured data, new architectures for parallelizing execution, and systems that apply technology to problems in healthcare. Margo Seltzer Pronouns: she, her Canada 150 Research Chair in Computer Systems Cheriton Family Chair in Computer Science UBC Computer Science 313-2366 Main Mall Vancouver, BC V6T 1Z4 Voice: 604-822-6642 mseltzer@cs.ubc.ca CV (traditional) CV (form 100) CV (NSERC CCV) Announcements News I am currently a co-Head for computer science. As such, my schedule is a bit of a nightmare. If you want to schedule an appointment with me, please send mail to headsec@cs.ubc.ca and indicate the purpose of the meeting. I am honored to have been elected to the Royal Society of Canada I am grateful to my colleagues who nominated me for the 2023 ACM Athena Lecturer Award.
